issue.title: GMTK gives zero clique error when supervision labels are directly adjacent

content.raw: No this problem has still not been solved. Another guess I had might be the fact that the supervised regions don't exactly fall the boundaries of  a gmtk frame though I don't know how that would be possible at 1bp resolution. It definitely seems like a problem with the way the model is setup for supervision.
content.html: No this problem has still not been solved. Another guess I had might be the fact that the supervised regions don't exactly fall the boundaries of a gmtk frame though I don't know how that would be possible at 1bp resolution. It definitely seems like a problem with the way the model is setup for supervision.
